channel.title: Quantum Apocalypse
channel.description:
Just watched, very high.
"A group of talented but rebellious 'rock-star scientists' find themselves in a race against time to save Earth when a comet makes an unexpected turn towards our blue planet where all life may cease to exist within days if our small town heroes fail to find a solution."
Just.. amazing. It got 3.0 out of 10 on IMDB which it fully deserves.
A+++++++ would watch again.

item.title: Quantum Apocalypse
item.dc:creator: @DEFET DEFET
item.description:
@DEFET wrote:

by the title i was assuming some sort of quantum mechanic with atoms tunneling and creating an apocalypse

but its all fine it has rockstar scientists

Read full topic
